thread.title: Arsenal star Santi Cazorla out for rest of the season | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Santi Cazorla out for rest of the season | Daily Mail Online

author: Sami Mokbel For Mailonline
title: Arsenal star Santi Cazorla out for rest of the season | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Spanish midfielder Santi Cazorla has now been ruled out for the season with a long-term ankle injury, as predicted in Sportsmail last month. Cazorla hasn't played since October due to the problem and had surgery to cure his achilles tendon injury last month. He was expected to be out until March, but the influential Spaniard suffered a setback in his recovery that caused him to require an additional operation. Santi Cazorla has now been ruled out for the season with a long-term ankle injury Cazorla underwent surgery back in December which he said had gone 'perfectly' Manager Arsene Wenger said last month: 'Santi is far from starting to run again. He had a little procedure and we have a meeting with the medical people today to see what it really was. 'Certainly he will not be available in the next six weeks, that is for sure. RELATED ARTICLES
